Significant Fuel Efficiency Gains with Noise and Pollution ReductionsProgressively Modernizing Our Fleet
48Comps: Boeing 787 vs. Boeing 767- 300ER; Airbus A350- 900 vs. B777- 200ER; Boeing 737- 9 MAX vs. Boeing 737- 900ER; Airbus A330- 900neo vs. Airbus A330 (NOx and Noise) and B767- 300ER (Fuel Burn); Airbus A321neo vs. Airbus A321ceo; 
Airbus A320neo vs. Airbus A320ceo; A220- 300 vs. Embraer 195- E1 and Airbus A319ceo; Embraer 195- E2 vs. Embraer 195- E1. 
Source: Airbus, Boeing, Embraer.
EPNdB = Effective Perceived Noise Decibel.
CAEP = Committee on Aviation Environmental Protection (a technical committee of the ICAO Council).
